Migration.Name: Synchronize DB version and date version on seed with code

Step.Comments: Set release no and version correctly
Step.SQLStatement: UPDATE AD_System SET ReleaseNo='3.9.0',Version='2017-08-01',Updated=TO_TIMESTAMP('2017-08-01 00:00:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),UpdatedBy=100 WHERE AD_System_ID=0;
